website_summaries.verdict: The Saucony Cohesion TR 11 has maintained the positive momentum gathered by the previous iterations in the series. With the optimistic comments regarding its price, design, and comfort, the shoe has evidently provided users with a satisfactory running experience. Despite the minor criticisms about some structural components, the shoe has proven itself to be a worthy and valuable investment towards an efficient running gear.
pros: Many buyers stated that the Saucony Cohesion TR 11 was an affordable shoe
A number of users liked the design and overall appearance of the shoe
Others also appreciated the color options available
The Cohesion TR 11 felt comfortable in both walking and running activities, according to a wearer
A satisfied user said the shoe helped relieve their back pain
Several customers described the shoe as lightweight
One runner claimed the midsole offered a precise fit and an adequate arch support
A user remarked that the shoe did not need a break-in period
cons: The inside of the shoe got hot while running on warmer days, a user mentioned
One buyer observed that the shoelaces were thin and flimsy
The Cohesion TR 11 seemed to have a narrow fit, even with the wide option, a wearer observed

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: Sauconey is my favorite brand. I wear 10 w and most shoes give me corns. I am on my feet a lot working in the medical field and these are very comfortable, they didn’t even need to be broken in. This is my 3rd pair and I’ve never had any problems with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: The Wide width is actually  narrower than my older Sauconys
customer_reviews.text: I specifically ordered a wide with in my normal size for Sauconys. I've worn them for years and am very familiar with the size and fit. Due to a recent foot injury, I ordered a wide instead of a regular size this time. When the shoes arrived, they felt narrower than my old pairs. I measured both the sole width and the interior width of all 3 pairs and the wide size is actually narrower than my older shoes. Additionally, the insole had almost no cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My wife absolutely loves these shoes. Great for a 1 to 3 mile a day runner. Would highly recommend for a heel striker.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Love Saucony, these not so much
customer_reviews.text: Saucony is my go to brand. These shoes are much wider in the toe area than other Saucony I've bought. I think they feel a tad "slippery" when wearing, like I'm going to slip and fall. I bought because of the color, I can wear with anything while on vacation and they don't clash with other colors. The shoelaces are too long and hit my leg when I walk. Probably won't buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: mauisunset

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes maybe run slightly large but not enough for me to have an issue. The toe base is nice and roomy. Very happy with the comfort of these shoes. I go through my shoes quickly as I aim to walk at least 5 miles a day. So my goal is to find shoes that work well at a decent price. These meet my criteria!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nanno

customer_reviews.title: Replace the insoles if you do a lot of walking or running
customer_reviews.text: If I tried to wear these with the insoles it comes with, as a heel-first walker, my feet would be toast in a couple of blocks. I use the Spenco walker/runner insoles with these. Then they are good. I have used the various Cohesions for a few years now. I recently switched to the TR variant and do think I have more traction walking over wet leaves/trails.
customer_reviews.author: Renard

customer_reviews.title: Very stiff and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is well made. It had a wonderful cushiness to the sole. But it is very heavy and stiff. They do not flex as you walk. Definitely would be uncomfortable as a running shoe. The tongue of the shoe is thick and after a few hours it begins to hurt the top of my foot as I walk. I am thinking of tossing them in the washer to soften them as I don’t think I can wear them long enough to break them in.
customer_reviews.author: birdbrain

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair of this style Saucony. They are so comfortable. I stand in 1 spot for 8 hours a day and my feet never hurt. I love the dark grey with mint and pink trim. Beautiful shoes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith and Matt

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this shoe before and it was awesome: this time around, I feel there is no support and I need to replace after 3 months. I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: My favs!
customer_reviews.text: I used to be a diehard New Balance fanatic. But once I tried Saucony, I feel like NB feel like 10 pound bricks on your feet! These shoes are a super cute color scheme and, more importantly, soooooooo comfortable. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny S.

customer_reviews.title: Holes in tops of shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Saucony shoes for years. These shoes are seriously disappointing---within 5 weeks of wearing them, they have holes in the top netting of both shoes, already. Of course, it's too late to return them, so am stuck with a substandard product. I will be purchasing another brand from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Guest

customer_reviews.title: Podiatrist recommended
customer_reviews.text: Took me a few days to get used to these as they are a little wider than what I usually get, but now they are great. My podiatrist recommended these for people with Achilles tendon issues.
customer_reviews.author: N. Herron

customer_reviews.title: Very teal
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are much more teal than gray, I thought the tops were all gray but they're definitely teal. That's ok tho. They are nice and roomy, I wear a wide and there's plenty of room in the foot. They're almost too long, but a half size smaller would be too tight. Ill just tighten up the laces!
customer_reviews.author: momof2

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe with a lot of support
customer_reviews.text: I got these because I wanted running shoes that provided more support than I was getting with my old ones. These aren't lightweight but they absolutely do provide amazing cushioning. I use them on the road which can be rough without support but these deliver.
customer_reviews.author: R. Abigail

customer_reviews.title: This is now my brand of choice
customer_reviews.text: I am a runner, but ordered these as everyday walking shoes, knowing that I could use them in a pinch for a run as well. I've now used them for both and LOVE them! The roomy toe box was a pleasant surprise. (My main running shoes are Ride and they are not quite as roomy) Very pleased with these shoes, especially for the price. Will definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Fontaine

customer_reviews.title: Blisters
customer_reviews.text: I just don't think this is as good as the reviews suggest it would be for a running shoe. Wears on the back of the heel and not great arch support.
customer_reviews.author: KF2007

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable good for light running (5K)
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Can't go back to my Nike's! A little wider than expected. Long laces good for double knots. Cushions in the back of heel.
customer_reviews.author: SAI723

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Money - and for long distance running
customer_reviews.text: I run outdoors on varying surfaces (concrete, trails, asphalt) 3x a week, 15-25 miles each run. I need shoes wide enough to fit with an orthotic insert and be of sufficient quality construction not to break down too quickly. These fit the bill exactly. They are reasonably priced and hold up very well. Also, the bottom of the shoe does not collect rocks which is important for outdoor runners. I purchased my last pair in February and replaced them in June - so getting four months (avg. 720+ miles) out of a pair of running shoes that cost less than $60 is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Wow, not at all what I  was hoping for.
customer_reviews.text: I researched running/walking shows for plus sized women and these shoes were on the list. I have NO IDEA why these shoes were on the list. My feet and heels have been killing me since I got these shoes. They don't have the cushion and support us bigger girls need.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Winger

customer_reviews.title: I like this brand.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of this brand of shoe that I have bought. This is a different style. I am happy with hem and I will continue to buy this brand. They give great support.
customer_reviews.author: HappyToBeHere

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable Sneaker I have ever worn!
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers were like slipping on Slippers! They were so comfortable from the first day I put them on and have purchased 2 more pairs in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Ferretti

customer_reviews.title: This is a replacement for a return
customer_reviews.text: The sole went bad in the first week on the first pair I got for my daughter. Replacement without any problems at no cost. Immediate response. So far everything looks good on this pair.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar V.

customer_reviews.title: Sneakers are perfect as always.
customer_reviews.text: Saucony sneakers always fit perfectly and do not change shoe size measurements from season to season. Their size 9 1/2 is always the same size 9 1/2 without question. I am a customer for life because Saucony product is consistent. Their sneakers feel like pillows on your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Lori M

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Great walking shoe! Have been breaking these in since they have arrived and I love them!
customer_reviews.author: K.Wojciechowski

customer_reviews.title: Shoe is too large and provides no support
customer_reviews.text: I am unable to wear this shoe since it is too large, was supposed to be a medium. There is no support at all. Very disappointed in this shoe. Since I no longer have the original packaging, I cannot send it back and am out the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I work as a nurse in a hospital! Love theses shoes! No back ache at the end of the day. Good grip on bottom. Dark color hides whatever I get on them! Will buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I instantly loved the comfort of the shoe the first time I put it on. I work in a factory. Shoe Comfort is important to me. However, my only complaint is they wore out Comfort wise rather quickly
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes. They always fit like they were made for me. I just wish they lasted a bit longer. I'm diabetic and hard on my shoes. But I have never had ulcers or blisters with Saucony shoes!
customer_reviews.author: M.J.R.

customer_reviews.title: Hated this Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge drop in quality and construction from Cohesion 10. Sent them back and found my loved Cohesion 10.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!!
customer_reviews.text: Shoes where perfect and I wear them daily. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne S.

customer_reviews.title: Good support, comfort and room for my toes!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, plenty of support and room for my toes.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes for nursing!
customer_reviews.text: I wear this brand as a nurse! Love them! They never disappoint and they carry wide width! Winning!
customer_reviews.author: Ltwarren7

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality sole
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had for 6 weeks and tread on the bottom is coming off. Very disappointed in a brand I usually love.
customer_reviews.author: A. Keiper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I use them for working 12 hour nursing shifts.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of saucony shoes and i love them.
customer_reviews.author: Jdh

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great, to bad the price keeps rising, but that's life.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Rajeski

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected and good cushion for tired feet.
customer_reviews.text: These fit great and give me good support during my long work days.
customer_reviews.author: Georgi K

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not durable.
customer_reviews.text: It's a very comfortable shoe but it doesn't hold up to wear and tear very well. I had holes in for area with a few months. This was the second pair I bought and they wore out in same area.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie T.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This sneaker is cute and comfortable. It is great for daily use, but not long walks. I have to have a bit wider instep on my left foot and this works.
customer_reviews.author: TMB

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: I use these for work! Love how light they feel on my feet. Good support in shoes is something I’m very cautious about and these definitely pass the test!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Show is fine, just ugly
customer_reviews.text: Ugly. Ugly. Fits fine but I don't need a pair of shoes I don't want to wear out of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Saucony for awhile. The wide fits nicely and is comfortable
customer_reviews.author: jojobeth

customer_reviews.title: Insanely comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I have heel spurs and they really provide me support and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: CE

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and support
customer_reviews.text: I love the support these provide. Would buy another pair in a minute!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret C.

customer_reviews.title: Shoes for walking
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoe for my everyday walk. Attractive color and style.
customer_reviews.author: msljanes

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Saucony makes running shoes that work for me. I already had a pair of the style that I was able to order from Amazon. Great shoe at a wonderful price.
customer_reviews.author: Umeboshibaba

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Love the color but the shoe is cheaply made to me
customer_reviews.author: T White

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes....
customer_reviews.text: Love these for work....I am hard on shoes and these hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Drexbarn

customer_reviews.title: On my Second Pair
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of this shoe. Last about a year and a half with running 2-5 miles 2-3 times a week. Wider toe box than most shoes, I have wide flat feet and the 7.5 are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MandyPandy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable show. NO breaking in time either. I believe this will be my favorite brand for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy S.

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfortable shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. They are true to size, and very comfortable for me to walk in.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne S. Fishman

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!!!!!! I love this brand and need a wide!! Awesome color! Would but again. Very true to size
customer_reviews.author: Kristen nocella

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for the money
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes... They are great for everyday but also for long walks.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Tolson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like the way the shoes fit. Not too much cushion which is good,at least for me.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine R Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes!! I have bought several pairs over the years and they fit perfectly!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Teed

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality on this style
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes in November 2018 because I had purchased Saucony shoes before and liked them. After wearing these for 4 months, they started to tear, in the same place on both shoes. The rest of the shoe shows very little wear, I guess I received a faulty pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wear it for 6 hours long everyday n most of the time I am on my feeya lot.Sole is not white which is a plus for me cuz I don't have to worry about it being dirty
customer_reviews.author: JVT

customer_reviews.title: Same as in picture.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as same as in picture. Love the color. Very light and fitting. Let’s see how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Dorje

customer_reviews.title: Great Style
customer_reviews.text: Solid running shoe. Great support, nice feel and Looks stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great quality for the price but I was given the wrong size when i ordered them.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I keep buying them over and over!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: The color and previous brand bought. Was a gift for someone and they liked them.
customer_reviews.author: Diane F

customer_reviews.title: Saucony is my favorite brand.
customer_reviews.text: Great sneaker at a great price! Good support and well made.
customer_reviews.author: DESIREERN03

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent ! Most comfortable ! And the price is just right!
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre Rose

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: Work,very comfortable I work long shift very ideal for long hours of work.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Smith

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I searched for the right shoe for a long time. The first pair of these particular shoes I bought from a retail store, and I wore them out! They are very comfortable and fit my foot perfectly. The retail store no longer sold them, so I bought this pair. They are just as great as the first pair. I hate the company is "moving on" and discontinuing the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the shoe and the comfort fit were better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Fits ok, but I used a shoe stretcher to widen the toe box. Now it's perfect. Could be a little less slippy on wet surfaces, but otherwise good.
customer_reviews.author: T. Shrawder

product_meta.title: Saucony Cohesion TR11 Wide
product_meta.description: When it comes to finding the right pair of athletic shoes, you just can't beat quality design. While there may be many different types of shoes to choose from, a great pair of running shoes is specifically designed for just that, running. Design is how [BRAND] shoes distinguish themselves above the rest. While most people think shoe design only affects the comfort of your feet, in reality, shoe design can affect your whole body. [BRAND] shoes were meticulously crafted with this in mind. [BRAND] shoes feature a [SOLE] sole able to effortlessly provide the traction needed to keep you moving forward at full speed while also supplying the flexibility to enable you to move naturally. Additionally, this stylish footwear is constructed with a [FABRIC1] fabric able to absorb any excess moisture while creating a light-weight, breathable atmosphere for your feet. The fusion of form and function in [BRAND] shoes makes them the best athletic shoes for those seeking to unleash their natural potential on the track. Slip on a pair of [BRAND] shoes and experience the superior comfort and support that [BRAND] shoes were designed to provide.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
Durable rubber outsole with added traction
